OSAKA
CITYNAME_END

OSA
CITYCODE_END
LINETYPE
METRO
LINETYPE_END
CITYEND

# =============================================================
#          Kitakyu Namboku Line
# =============================================================
SEGMENT
FORWARD
"Line 1a, towards Esaka"
FORWARDEND
BACKWARD
"Line 1a, towards Senri-Chūō"
BACKWARDEND
STATIONS
"Senri-Chūō (M8)" 	
"Momoyama-dai (M9)"
"Ryokuchi-kōen (M10)"
"Esaka (M11)"
STATIONSEND
SEGMENTEND

STATIONSEND

"Kadoma-shi / 24"
